pageContext.claim: “The [Britain First retweet] was done because I am a big believer in fighting radical Islamic terror. This was a depiction of radical Islamic terror.”
pageContext.analysis: The Britain First videos the president tweeted appeared to be selected at random without context or original sourcing. In one case, there was no evidence the person shown was Muslim. In another, the footage was from a coup in Egypt. The video titled "Muslim destroys a statue of Virgin Mary" couldn't be verified. To say the videos were a "depiction of radical Islamic terror" is a stretch at best.
